channel.title: Classic Gluon Gun
channel.description:
Is it acceptable to create a new thread every time I create a new model? I don't know, but I'm doing it.
[img]https://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/half-life/images/c/c3/Gluon_Gun.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090802170607&path-prefix=en[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/72JddPj.png[/img]
[img='https://i.imgur.com/hKY3IUF.jpg',none,512][/img][img='https://i.imgur.com/N9f6IDS.jpg',none,512][/img] [img='https://i.imgur.com/xS8uGpY.jpg',none,512][/img][img='https://i.imgur.com/ahPZteG.jpg',none,512][/img]
Not that I don't like BM's new Gluon, I just wanted more practice. If you'd like to try it out, you can get it from one of these two:
[url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=608179688']Workshop[/url] [url='https://blackmesa.gamebanana.com/skins/143662']Gamebanana[/url]
It's not currently compatible with any arm mods, except for my own. If you'd like to use this with my HD Styled hands, [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/thyfywlwa1okrkp/egon_classic_hd.vpk?dl=0']download this[/url] instead, place in your [i]steam\steamapps\black mesa\bms\addons[/i] folder.
Feedback, suggestions, hatred, etc. are all welcome.

item.title: Classic Gluon Gun
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Is it acceptable to create a new thread every time I create a new model? I don’t know, but I’m doing it.


2560×1440


Not that I don’t like BM’s new Gluon, I just wanted more practice.
If you’d like to try it out, you can get it from one of these two:

Workshop
Gamebanana

It’s not currently compatible with any arm mods, except for my own. If you’d like to use this with my HD Styled hands, download this instead, place in your steam\steamapps\black mesa\bms\addons folder.

Feedback, suggestions, hatred, etc. are all welcome.

Read full topic
